ValidationRule.description: NICC-055369 Certain fields on the Internal Project record type and Workstream records are not editable to most users after the project has been Approved.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT( ISNEW() ) && NOT($Permission.Edit_AH_Project_Backlog_Internal_Projects) && NI_Project_Backlog__r.RecordType.DeveloperName = "Commercial_Operation_Projects" && NI_Project_Backlog__r.Approved__c = TRUE && OR( ISCHANGED( Annual_Efficiencies_Savings_hrs__c ) , ISCHANGED( Hourly_Cost__c ) , ISCHANGED( Annual_Efficiencies_Savings_Confidence__c ) , ISCHANGED( First_Year_Cost_Reduction__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Benefits information cannot be changed after the project has been approved. Please speak with the Project Owner, or refer to the Internal Project Prioritization Intake documentation for further information.
